subject: Horses
Olympic Games (2008)
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: Horses will depart for the Olympic Games as part of a global migration that will ultimately include 297 horses from 47 nations traveling on 57 airplanes.
snippet: Horses will depart for the Olympic Games as part of a global migration that will ultimately include 297 horses from 47 nations traveling on 57 airplanes.
